simplificado enfocado en yield management, no en collateral management  IMPORTANTE: Solo acepta MUSD (no BTC directo) - Los usuarios deben obtener MUSD primero en mezo.org - MUSD tiene 18 decimales (ERC20 est\u00e1ndar) - Nos enfocamos solo en optimizar yields, no en CDP management  Flujo principal: 1. Usuario obtiene MUSD en mezo.org (deposita BTC all\u00e1) 2. Usuario aprueba MUSD a este contrato 3. Usuario deposita MUSD en IndividualPool 4. MUSD se deposita en yield aggregator para ganar rendimientos 5. Yields se acumulan autom\u00e1ticamente 6. Usuario puede retirar en cualquier momento","errors":{"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract)."}],"AddressInsufficientBalance(address)":[{"details":"The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"FailedInnerCall()":[{"details":"A call to an address target failed. returns.yieldAmount: Cantidad de yields reclamados (después de fees)

params._musd: Address of MUSD token (Mezo native stablecoin)

deposit(uint256).details: Usuario debe aprobar MUSD antes de llamar esta función

params.musdAmount: Cantidad de MUSD a depositar (18 decimales)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateYield().details: Calcula yields basado en el tiempo transcurrido y la posición del pool

calculateYield(address).notice: Calcula yields acumulados del usuario (incluyendo pendientes)

claimYield().notice: Reclama yields acumulados sin retirar el principal

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposita MUSD para generar yields optimizados

getUserInfo(address).notice: Obtiene información completa del depósito del usuario

totalMusdDeposited().notice: Total MUSD depositado en el pool

updateYield().notice: Actualiza los yields acumulados de un usuario
